text: The sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel. (Though he was the firstborn, his birthright was given to the sons of Joseph son of Israel because he had defiled his father's bed.5:1. Reuben had slept with Bilhah, Jacob's concubine. Genesis 35:22, Genesis 49:4. That is why Reuben is not listed in the genealogy according to birthright,
